programme.title: Despite his injuries, Lee keeps on fighting desperately. But the tornado that envelopes Raiga’s attack takes the form of a dragon, and Lee is swallowed up by it.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is chosen to lead Konohamaru, Moegi and Udon in a survival training exercise. Their destination is the Stone Face of Warudakumi at the top of Mt. Takurami…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade orders Naruto, Hinata, Kiba and Akamaru on a mission to capture the thief Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others tend to an injured Sazanami. As Sazanami tells it, he had once been a swordsmith in a peaceful town and was framed for a murder committed by Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While Guy and Lee are away, two impostors dressed like them sneak into Hidden Leaf Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Land of Birds is in turmoil due to a specter known as the Cursed Warrior, which is believed to be the ghost of Lord Owashi, the previous feudal lord who died suddenly.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Moso, the late feudal lord’s counselor, and Komei, the chief strategist, are at odds with each other. Neji begins to think that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Komei is controlling the Cursed Warrior. Moso thwarts Komei's ambitions. The Leaf team feels uneasy about his motives. Neji doesn't want to get involved, but Naruto is defiant. Gamakichi and Gamatatsu are summoned to investigate…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi. He senses that their being followed. Komei has been declared a criminal and is to be executed. The Cursed Warrior appears and snatches Komei away.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi. Neither words nor Naruto's attempts to stop him can deter Sagi from his chosen path of revenge.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: At Moso's mansion, a battle takes place between the Wandering Ninja and a Leaf Ninja. With Chishima's help, Naruto is freed from Moso's genjutsu. Moso then reveals his true form as the leader of the Wandering ninja, Hoki!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Choji and Naruto are craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: As soon as she awakens, Anko begins to remember Demon Island, a place once visited with her former sensei, Orochimaru. Anko reveals the truth behind the disappearances and the secret behind Isaribi's body.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Hidden Leaf ninja and Amachi battle it out at sea. With Naruto's help, Amachi is defeated, but then a monster appears. Naruto summons Gamabunta in order to defeat the monster.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are searching for buried treasure at the request of Tsunade's friend Agari Kaisen. Thinking its an easy task since they have a map, Tsunade threatens to send them back to the Academy if they fail.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto discovers Jiraiya is up to no good. Jiraiya claims to be busy getting his manuscript ready before his deadline. Impatient and irritated, Naruto writes his own manuscript for Jiraiya!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Hidden Leaf Village receives a request from the Village Hidden in the Stars to guard a star. The star is actually a meteorite that fell 200 years ago and is said to possess mysterious powers.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others investigate the whereabouts of the stolen star. The team suspects that is an inside job because the ninja who took the star used the ninja art, Kujaku, from the Star Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akahoshi, the masked ninja who kidnapped Sumaru, intends to use Sumaru to call out the mysterious ninja who stole the star.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The masked ninja and Naruto fall into the depths of the Valley. While tending to Naruto's wounds, the masked ninja tells him the reason for stealing the star.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Natsuhi's body is reacting to the effects of the star. She wields the star and desperately confronts Akahoshi, but Sumaru is taken as hostage
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Killing Them Softly, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: During the economic turmoil of 2008, Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt), an enforcer, is hired to restore order after three idiots rob a mob-protected poker game.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Hoodlum, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: 1930's New York. The black community of Harlem faces the same indignities as countless millions of refugees. If the seeds of Harlem's urban power would not grow in the White city, the Black underground would form to take control.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: Killing Them Softly, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: During the economic turmoil of 2008, Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt), an enforcer, is hired to restore order after three idiots rob a mob-protected poker game.

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards, (2000, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: An unhappy dentist in Montreal gets a new neighbor, Jimmy 'The Tulip' Teduski, a former mob hitman turned informant with a price on his head.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Under the Silver Lake, (2019, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: When his beautiful, mysterious neighbor disappears without a trace, Sam (Andrew Garfield) tries to find the parties responsible, unraveling a string of strange crimes, unsolved murders, & bizarre coincidences in his East L.A. neighborhood.

programme.title: Beat Street, (1984, Musical)
programme.desc: Urban ghetto kids from the South Bronx find creative outlets in painting graffiti, breakdancing, rapping, and developing new disco D.J. routines.

programme.title: Breakin' 2: Electric Boogaloo, (1984, Musical)
programme.desc: The beat doesn't slow down in this slammin' sequel to "Breakin'.'" This fly follow-up finds our poppin' and lockin' trio Kelly, Ozone and Turbo trying to rescue a community center facing demolition at the hands of a greedy real-estate developer.

programme.title: Dance Flick, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Street dancer Thomas Uncles is from the wrong side of the tracks, but his bond with the beautiful Megan White might help the duo realize their dreams as they enter into the mother of all dance battles.

programme.title: Go For It, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Carmen lives for hip-hop dance but when her professor finds out, she gets a big dose of reality. Now she’s faced with a huge decision… and just might have to dance for her life.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Footloose, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: City kid Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock 'n' roll and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

programme.title: How She Move, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: How She Move is an energetic and inspiring coming of age tale about a young woman step dances her heart out to achieve her dreams.

programme.title: Jennifer Eight, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: They are the unidentified victims of an unsolved death spree, women linked by a killer’s gruesome handiwork and by police files giving them the code name “Jennifer.”

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: Jennifer Eight, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: They are the unidentified victims of an unsolved death spree, women linked by a killer’s gruesome handiwork and by police files giving them the code name “Jennifer.”

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: Kingpin, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: The Boys From Brazil, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

programme.title: Force 10 From Navarone, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: A group of allied commandos on a mission against the 3rd Reich has orders to blow a giant dam in order to crush a strategic bridge held by the Nazis.

programme.title: The Molly Maguires, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Life is rough in the coal mines of 1876 Pennsylvania. A group of Irish emigrant miners, known as the Molly Maguires, fights against the cruelty of the mining company with sabotage.

programme.title: Hit!, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: U.S. agent Nick Allen (Billy Dee Williams) has his own idea about how to fight a war on drugs: go to the source...and cut the big-time traffickers down. Embittered over the drug-related death of his teenage daughter, Nick sets out to do just that.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's blimp is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noah and his henchmen - five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba's past who are out for revenge!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley's Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Yugi struggles to make heads or tails of the Deck Master System, Big 1 uses his Deck Master ability to send all of Yugi's attacks right back! How can Yugi defeat an opponent when his attacks take away his own life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Téa squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: After reaching Laugh Tale, Roger declares the disbanding of his pirate group and disembarks first. Oden gets dropped off at the Land of Wano and reunites with his family and retainers.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!

programme.title: Enraged by Orochi's tyrannical acts, Oden raids his castle in the Flower Capital and points his sword at Orochi. However, hours later, people who were waiting for Oden to come out after defeating Orochi see the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!

programme.title: Oden keeps dancing naked in the Flower Capital and losing all the trust of the people. One day, Orochi comes to Kuri and reveals his evil plan for the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Raid! Oden and the Akazaya Nine!

programme.title: Kaido comes to the mainland along with his troops to fight against Oden and the Akazaya samurai who were on their way to raid Kaido's mansion. Even though Oden's group are unprepared and outnumbered, they fight hard to save the future of the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Battle! Oden vs. Kaido!

programme.title: Oden and the Akazaya members are sentenced to death by boiling in a pot. Oden asks for a chance to survive which is accepted by Kaido. Then, Oden enters the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Boiled to Death! Oden's One-hour Struggle!

programme.title: As Oden continues trying to survive in the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head, people learn the truth from Shinobu and get shocked. At the same time, Oden tells his retainers the importance of opening the borders of the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!

programme.title: As Kin'emon and the others run to Oden Castle to save Oden's family, the castle is set on fire and Kaido attacks Toki and her children.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!

programme.title: The day of the Fire Festival has finally come and the whole army is now getting ready to head for Onigashima to raid Kaido!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and thousands of allies who were supposed to be there are nowhere to be found, but Kin'emon and the others decide to set sail to the stormy sea in a small boat.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sea Is For Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, and Kid join the Akazaya samurai and begin to fight Kaido's army. The three rivals from the Worst Generation compete with each other as they attack the enemy fleet with their ultimate skills.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!

programme.title: The Akazaya members are surprised by help from their old mate and Kin'emon notices he made a big mistake which has luckily saved all his allies. As their battle against Kaido's army heats up, the cornered Kanjuro makes a stunning move.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Swept away by Kanjuro, Momonosuke remembers his father, tries to rise above his fear, and speak to his allies. Luffy and the others start heading for Onigashima, but Kaido's army gets in their way again with a formidable weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tearful Promise! The Kidnapped Momonosuke!

programme.title: Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hat crew are excited to see Jimbei again and welcome him as a new member. Meanwhile, Law and the Akazaya members strategize on how to enter Onigashima and attack Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Member! 'First Son of the Sea' Jimbei!

programme.title: To Law and the others' surprise, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats attack the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima. Meanwhile, Kaido and Orochi are having a big banquet on the island where Kaido's formidable subordinates are also called in.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido’s Trump Card! The Tobi Roppo Appear!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the samurai warriors finally reach Onigashima! Before they set out for the castle as they planned, the samurai warriors use surprising but determined tactics to cut off their retreat which leave the Straw Hats in shock.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Samurai Warriors’ Earnestness! The Straw Hats Land at Onigashima!

programme.title: Eustass Kid and his clan start heading for Kaido's castle head on waving Luffy off. Luffy and Zoro go after them to stop them from causing trouble, but they happen to step into Kaido's banquet.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Goes Out of Control?! Sneaking into Kaido’s Banquet!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro each witness Kaido's subordinates waste food at the banquet and make fun of the poor people in the Land of Wano. Thinking of Otama, a small girl who liked red-bean soup so much, both Luffy and Zoro become infuriated and create turmoil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thinking of Otama! Luffy’s Furious Strike!

programme.title: After making a scene at the Golden Festival, Luffy and Zoro try to get away, but Queen announces his subordinates that anyone who catches them will be rewarded with a position in the Tobi Roppo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fighting Music! An Ability That Harms Luffy!

programme.title: Haccha, a supergiant Number, joins in and the pursuit of Luffy and the others becomes even more intense!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: His Dream Broken?! The Trap That Lures Sanji!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and all the others are trying to infiltrate Kaido's castle from all sides. Meanwhile, Big Mom's children are climbing up the waterfall towards Onigashima, but this time, Marco the Phoenix appears from nowhere and stands in their way!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Reinforcements Arrive! The Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: The furious Big Mom chases Brachio Tank driven by Chopper and Usopp, but they bravely fight back!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Pact Between Men! The Fierce Fighting of Brachio Tank!

programme.title: Luffy runs into Ulti and Page One, members of the Tobi Roppo from the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Hearing that he aims to become the King of the Pirates, the brother and sister duo become infuriated and turn themselves into massive beasts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thunder Bagua! Here Comes Kaido’s Son!

programme.title: Evading Ulti and Page One, strong members of the Tobi Roppo, Luffy tries to find out what Kaido's son Yamato's motive is. However, the two get in a fight. Taking Luffy's punishing attacks, Yamato remembers someone he fought against in the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!

programme.title: The Akazaya members who were on board Law's Polar Tang finally reach Onigashima and see someone who they didn't expect. Kaido's son Yamato starts telling his story to Luffy, shares his passion, and reveals what's behind his mask!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desire to be Oden! Yamato’s Dream!

programme.title: At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they're blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamato’s Freedom!

programme.title: Kaido's plan to obtain the great treasure infuriates Orochi, but his unexpected violent move silences everyone. Meanwhile at the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro and gets into an emotional fight with her former colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!

programme.title: The Akazaya members start charging towards Kaido from the back of Onigashima. Meanwhile, at the Performance Floor, Kaido closes in on Momonosuke shivering in terror and asks him the ultimate question which will determine his fate.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato try to back them up, but Ulti stands in their way and Big Mom spots Luffy. Meanwhile, Nami and Carrot free themselves from their enemies and move on to take back Zeus!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffy’s All-Out War Begins!

programme.title: The Animal Kingdom Pirates gasp with surprise to see thousands of samurai warriors coming into the castle. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon/
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!

programme.title: Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. On the other hand, Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom and runs away but loses him again and gets chased by Zeus who is ordered to kill to her by Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato finally meets his son Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I’ll Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!

programme.title: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin'emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!

programme.title: Who's-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Pixels, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Former best friends must join forces and take the battle from the consoles to the streets when an army of aliens attacks Earth with massive video game characters.

programme.title: Hercules, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: The most towering myth of all time meets up with the mission of a real man in this action-adventure thriller that reveals the famed symbol of courage as he’s never been seen before: finding the hero’s heart that beats beneath his colossal image.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Pixels, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Former best friends must join forces and take the battle from the consoles to the streets when an army of aliens attacks Earth with massive video game characters.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: The Halliday Brand, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: A western about a young man's (Joseph Cotten) disillusionment with his father (Ward Bond), a corrupt sheriff. When his dad turns away from the lynching of his sister's lover, the boy rebels and his father declares him an 'outlaw.'

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon, (1970, Musical)
programme.desc: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife...

programme.title: Pardners, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch. They accidentally clean up the town.

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two, (2006, Comedy)

programme.title: Jackass 3, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: The jackass guys are back, so brace yourself for unbelievable and totally explicit stunts from the idiots you've come to know and love from a safe and sanitary distance!

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville reprises his jackass role as 86-year-old Irving Zisman in the story of an old man saddled with the care of his grandson. The two hustle their way across America on an outrageous road trip pranking unsuspecting, real-life people.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.
